info.description:
This API will return Point of Sale Data

__The base endpoint URL for this API in production is:__ `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/pos`.
info.title: Point of Sale

get.description: Returns POS Real Time Sales Data

200.description: Provides the Transaction Check data by POS System

sourceSystemParam.name: source_system
sourceSystemParam.description:
Name of the POS System:
 * `BYPS` - Bypass

startDateTimeParam.name: start_date_time
startDateTimeParam.description: Calendar start date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH24:mm"

endDateTimeParam.name: end_date_time
endDateTimeParam.description: Calendar end date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH24:mm"

skusParam.name: skus
skusParam.description: Comma separated list of Item SKUs

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: Page number of result set. Default 1

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of rows in each page to return. Default 50

rawParam.name: raw
rawParam.description: Flag used to determine if the data is direct from the source system, unconformed or not

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

first_order_time.description: Time of the First Item Sold

last_order_time.description: Time of the Last Item Sold
